content.subject: Fwd: Issue #408: CSS for Internationalisation, Performance Monitoring in Animations, @property
content.body:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: CSS Weekly <newsletter@css-weekly.com>
Date: Tue, Apr 28, 2020 at 11:32 PM
Subject: Issue #408: CSS for Internationalisation, Performance Monitoring
in Animations, @property
To: <thesilentimp@gmail.com>







[image: CSS Weekly]
Issue #408 â¢ April 28, 2020
view online version
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=4fec84bf1f&e=63b2a789f5>





CSS for Internationalisation
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=b95704b99a&e=63b2a789f5>


[image: css-for-internationalisation.png]
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=5567b2d4de&e=63b2a789f5>

Chen Hui Jing covers the CSS-related aspects of multilingual support.

Read more
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=7e0371ae4d&e=63b2a789f5>

Performance Monitoring in CSS Animations
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=03699985f1&e=63b2a789f5>


[image: performance-monitoring-in-css-animations.png]
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=db6d487b0a&e=63b2a789f5>

Virendra Singh explores various flavors of CSS animation along with their
performance implications.

Read more
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=37aee92c98&e=63b2a789f5>



From Our Sponsor (via ThoughtLeaders)
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=9fdc7c4a41&e=63b2a789f5>





Isolate and collaborate - Clubhouse.io
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=b8e6d72250&e=63b2a789f5>


[image: isolate-and-collaborate-clubhouseio.jpg]
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=3f737212b3&e=63b2a789f5>

Work remotely, get things done. Clubhouse puts the âworkâ in WFH while
keeping it enjoyable, for any team, any size, anywhere.

Try it Free
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=796382da11&e=63b2a789f5>



Articles & Tutorials





Accessible Font Sizing, Explained
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=ec18f9cd84&e=63b2a789f5>

AndrÃ©s Galante explains how can we make an accessible reading experience.

Read more
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=b0affef424&e=63b2a789f5>

Using CSS to Control Text Selection
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=dced49011b&e=63b2a789f5>

Will Boyd outlines some things that can be done with CSS and text
selections.

Read more
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=6ac64ca772&e=63b2a789f5>

@property
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=d2edfbddc0&e=63b2a789f5>

Chris Coyier introduces @property, a way to declare a custom CSS property.

Read more
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=eb94de93d5&e=63b2a789f5>

Constrained CSS Grids Without Max-Width
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=8379a6ba82&e=63b2a789f5>

Ethan Marcotte shares a handy layout technique of creating grid items that
extend into that constraint column, creating full-bleed layouts as needed.

Read more
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=7a993b76bf&e=63b2a789f5>

Whatâs in a Name?
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=222a03d7f9&e=63b2a789f5>

Sarah Higley outlines why and when you should give an accessible name to
some HTML elements.

Read more
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=55762b54eb&e=63b2a789f5>



Promoted Link
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=fdf3a04496&e=63b2a789f5>





 [image: heydesigner.png]
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=18b3eaa6f1&e=63b2a789f5>
HeyDesigner
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=b1ca9132a2&e=63b2a789f5>

HeyDesigner is a daily and weekly curated newsletter for product people,
UXers, PMs and frontend developers.

Sign Up
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=a708572d75&e=63b2a789f5>



Tools





Color Contrast Checker
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=c65ff797be&e=63b2a789f5>

An online tool that analyses and suggests colors that meet the required
contrast ratio.

Check it out
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=a95e624d0d&e=63b2a789f5>

Colors.lol
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=3c574ee700&e=63b2a789f5>

A fun tool to discover interesting color combinations.

Check it out
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=d25c687ce6&e=63b2a789f5>



Inspiration





Pure CSS "Eye"
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=6f9c1c18e0&e=63b2a789f5>


[image: pure-css-eye.jpg]
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=0c4c755904&e=63b2a789f5>

Julia Miocene created a stunning animation in pure CSS.

Get inspired
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=d273c801ea&e=63b2a789f5>



Until Next Week





Thanks for reading! If you find the content valuable, please consider
supporting
the newsletter on Patreon
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=3273378568&e=63b2a789f5>
.

Happy coding,
Zoran Jambor
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=31e9a58134&e=63b2a789f5>






Find CSS Weekly on Twitter and Facebook: [image: Follow CSS Weekly on
Twitter]
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=2a6b755a0a&e=63b2a789f5>
[image:
Follow CSS Weekly on Facebook]
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/track/click?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=7197f9bed9&e=63b2a789f5>





You're subscribed because you wanted weekly report about latest and
greatest from CSS world.
Unsubscribe
<https://css-weekly.us2.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=22abf1e39f850260e7d9af1c9&id=3df91c6206&e=63b2a789f5&c=f50afbf406>
